General.Name: APro Co. Ltd.
General.Description: APRO Co., Ltd. supplies rechargeable li-ion battery manufacturing equipment worldwide. The company offers integrated solutions for battery applications, such as electric vehicles and e-mobility based on power conversion and control technology. It also provides solutions of high-tech technology of power conversion, user-friendly design, production know-how, and post-production. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Gunpo-si, South Korea.
General.Address: A-PRO Technopia Building, Gunpo-si, South Korea
